A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just like how Mark Hamill's character says\, 'this is not going to go the way you think'\, is an understatement. This film took a hard u-turn from the Star Wars Skywalker saga. It feels like Disney only cares about keeping secrets and surprising audiences\, rather than just making a good story. Rian Johnson introduced character 'powers' that we've never seen in ANY of the Star Wars films\, making it feel like a super hero movie. There were way too many political agendas in this film--the whole point of the film is too 'escape' reality\, which it did not. I really wanted to like this film\, but 24 hours after seeing it\, I can't really think of any good things besides the effects and cinematography.
